briefdescription.para: The coefficient of the Monomial.
The degree of the Monomial.
Default constructor for when initialized with no arguments.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double cf, const int dgr) noexcept
memberdef.name: Monomial

briefdescription.para: Normal constructor for initialization with coeff and degree.

parameterdescription.para: The coefficient as a double.
The degree as a integer.

briefdescription.para: Copy constructor for when initialized with an lvalue Monomial object.

parameterdescription.para: The lvalue Monomial object.

briefdescription.para: Move constructor for when initialized with an rvalue Monomial object.

parameterdescription.para: The rvalue Monomial object.

briefdescription.para: Assigment operator overload for when called with an lvalue.

parameterdescription.para: The lvalue Monomial object.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation

briefdescription.para: Move assigment operator overload for when called with an rvalue.

parameterdescription.para: The rvalue Monomial object.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation

briefdescription.para: Equal logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If Monomial objects coefficients and degrees match.
(false) If Monomial objects coefficients and degrees dont match.

briefdescription.para: Not equal logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If Monomial objects coefficients and degrees dont match.
(false) If Monomial objects coefficients and degrees match.

briefdescription.para: Greater than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Monomial object degree is greater than the degree of the passed Monomial.
(false) If the Monomial object degree is equal or less than the degree of the passed Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Less than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Monomial object degree is less than the degree of the passed Monomial.
(false) If the Monomial object degree is equal or greater than the degree of the passed Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Greater or equal than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Monomial object degree is greater or equal than the degree of the passed Monomial.
(false) If the Monomial object degree is less than the degree of the passed Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Less or equal than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Monomial object degree is less or equal than the degree of the passed Monomial.
(false) If the Monomial object degree is greater than the degree of the passed Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Addition operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to add.

simplesect.para: (Monomial) A brand new Monomial that represents the result.

briefdescription.para: Substraction operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to substract by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial) A brand new Monomial that represents the result.

briefdescription.para: Multiplication operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to multiply by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial) A brand new Monomial that represents the result.

briefdescription.para: Division operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to divide by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial) A brand new Monomial that represents the result.

briefdescription.para: Modulus operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to divide by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial) A brand new Monomial that represents the result.

briefdescription.para: Addition assigment operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to add.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Substraction assigment operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to substract by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Multiplication assigment operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to multiply by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Division assigment operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to divide by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Modulus assigment operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Monomial object to divide by.

simplesect.para: (Monomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the coefficient of the Monomial.

simplesect.para: (double) The coefficient of the Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the degree of the Monomial.

simplesect.para: (int) The degree of the Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Setter function for setting the coefficient of the Monomial.

parameterdescription.para: The coefficient to set to.

briefdescription.para: Setter function for setting the degree of the Monomial.

parameterdescription.para: The degree to set to.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the expression of the Monomial.

simplesect.para: (std::string) The expression of the Monomial.

briefdescription.para: Calculus function for getting the value of the Monomial at a point.

parameterdescription.para: The point to evaluate.

simplesect.para: (double) The result of the evaluation of the Monomial.

briefdescription.para: The class destructor.
A friend operator to insert the Monomial into a std::stringstream.

parameterdescription.para: The std::stringstream.
The Monomial object to insert.

simplesect.para: (std::stringstream&) A reference to the std::stringstream.

briefdescription.para: A friend operator to insert the Monomial into a std::ostream.

parameterdescription.para: The std::ostream.
The Monomial object to insert.

simplesect.para: (std::ostream&) A reference to the std::ostream.

briefdescription.para: The swap function for the copy-and-swap idiom implemented by the assigment operators.

parameterdescription.para: The other Monomial to swap the data with.

briefdescription.para: Class for representing and operating monomials.

detaileddescription.para: The class consists of the constructors, the operators, the getters, the properties and some private functions.
